name: ecoZen Waxed Canvas Welding Apron with Kevlar Thread - Heat and Chemical Resistant, Fully Adjustable to Comfortably Fit Men and Women, 27 x 34 inches, Heavy Duty Tool Apron - Black, Size S to XXL
short_description: TOP QUALITY! Heat & Chemical Resistant heavy duty. Made of 16oz Waxed Canvas, sewing with strong, heat resistant Kevlar thread. Try this tough & functional shop apron and you will forget any leather apron on the market.

REVOLUTIONARY! Unlike other aprons that are stiff and heavy as cardboard which cause you extremely discomfort, our apron features a VERY TOUGH BUT FLEXIBLE material that give you protection and still flexible enough to move comfortably. It also doesn't trap dust and prevent oils from soaking through to your clothes. That's why our shop apron is the #1 choice for Amazon buyers!

A FRESH APPROACH! The problem with other aprons is it cause neck and back pain as it is hang around your neck. Our product solves that problem! Why? That's because our apron is designed to HANG OVER SHOULDER which means that weight is distributed evenly over the shoulders. NEVER SUFFER NECK AND BACK PAIN AGAIN!

PRACTICAL! Our Apron has STRATEGICALLY PLACED POCKETS so that you have everything you need close to hand instead of constantly search for them. Front pockets are deep and has ample space with flap to keep out dust and can be tucked into pocket. The "cell phone pocket" is large enough to hold iphone 8+ with zip to prevent it fall out when bending over.

UNIQUE! Because our apron has a quick release buckle and unique harness design which is EASILY AND FULLY ADJUSTABLE. That is great because it can adjust to fit any body frame and preference. Once you have it adjusted to your fit, TAKING IT OFF AND ON IS STRAIGHTFORWARD and it stays on well without slipping off.

name: 45" Extra Long Waterproof Butcher Apron, PU Leather Heavy Duty Apron for Dishwashing, Lab Work, Pet Grooming, Chemical Resistant Oil Proof Industrial Apron with Flannelette Back, Black
product_description: Professional Grade Protection with Superior Comfort The Heavy Duty Apron is engineered for professionals who demand high-level protection without sacrificing comfort. Combining soft, flexible PU leather with a cozy flannelette interior, this apron moves naturally with your body while providing a formidable barrier against liquids, oil, and grease. Specifications: Material: Soft PU leather Shell, Polyester Flannelette Backing Size: 115 x 75 cm / 45.28 x 29.53 inches Color: Black Features: Extra Long Coverage, Robust Construction, Water-Resistant Care: Rinse or wipe with water/soapy water; air dry only Why Choose the Apron Plus Size Women? The 45-inch length ensures that even your lower legs stay dry. The thick yet supple PU shell is built to stay sturdy through rigorous use in workshops, kitchens, or farms. Important Care Instructions: To preserve the waterproof coating and soft texture of your PU leather apron, do not machine wash, tumble dry, spin-dry, or dry-clean . Simply rinse the surface or wipe it with a damp cloth and mild soapy water, then hang to air dry. Frequently Asked Questions: Q: Is the material stiff? A: No, our dad apron for grilling is made of quality PU leather specifically chosen for its softness and flexibility, making it comfortable for all-day wear in demanding environments. Q: Can I wash this in a washing machine? A: We do not recommend machine washing or dry-cleaning, as this can damage the protective PU layer. A simple wipe or rinse with soapy water is all you need. Q: Is it suitable for heavy-duty work? A: Yes, it is designed for versatile use, from cooking, commercial meat processing and fishmonger tasks to woodworking and construction.
